page.title: 16COMMUNICATIONS IN CRUDEN BAY
page.content: Telecommunications:- There is a small telephone exchange in Cruden Bay. the majority of houses have a telephone. There are 2 public phone boxes in the village. The telephone numbers have recently been prefixed by 81 and the code for incoming calls from outside the village is 0779. Postal services:- There is a post office in the village,but letters are sorted in Peterhead. There are two lifts from the post box and one delivery per day. The post man travels round by van,having collected and sorted the letters and parcels in Peterhead.
